title: YOU DON'T HAVE TO DIE || Ep:94
description:
In this episode:
I help you understand the importance of life. I help you understand how to deal with grief. This is an episode that will truly wake you up and change your life. This isn't some perfection podcast, this is a REAL ONE.

Hit me up on Instagram @TrentShelton and let me know what touched your heart.
Also, Share this episode with someone you know going through a season of grief.
Make sure you text me 817.242.2719 to see when I'm coming to your city, and also my free trainings.
itunes:author: Trent Shelton Companies
